name: Elastos
intro: A decentralized OS for the Intenet
introduce: Elastos is creating the next-generation infrastructure for the modern internet to allow for full decentralization, security, monetization, and ownership of user data and privacy through leveraging the unique features of blockchain technology. It provides developers with the necessary tools to build and deploy open source SmartWeb dApps that can function as peer-to-peer networks, decentralized data storage services, and decentralized identity solutions for users on a global scale.
